name: 曾勝茂
objective: 課程內容包含高分子性質與結構關係、高分子合成簡介與分子量檢測、高分子溶液熱力學，機械、熱、光、電學性質及其理論推導、高分子流變與加工特性，押出、射出等高分子加工方法與、二次加工，加工助劑使用與性質簡介。經由熟悉高分子物性、物性檢測與加工方法，了解高分子構造與形態、物性相關性，現有高分子加工方法與機械設備，添加劑的功能與使用，培養學生跨入工業界就業或研究高分子材料的基礎，
schedule:
1.Introduction of polymer - Structure-Property Relationships
2.Syntheses of Macromolecular Compounds and deterimination of Molecular weight
3.Thermal transition in polymer
4.Solution properties of polymer
5.Mechanical properties of polymer (I) - solid state
6.Mechanical properties of polymer (II) - melt
7.mixing and polymer blending
8.extrusion
9.injection molding
10.secondashapingry
11.additives for polymer processing
scorePolicy:
期中考
期末考
分組討論/報告
materials:
referrences:
1.Fundaments of Polymer Engineering (2nd ed.) -by Anil Kumar and Rakesh K. Gupta
2.Polymer Engineering Science and Viscoelasticity : An Introduction - by Hal F. Brinson and L. Catherine Brinson
3.Principles of Polymer Systems (5th ed.)– by Ferdinand Rodriguex et al
4.Polymer Processing Fundamentals – by Tim A Osswald
5.高分子加工與工程 –林建中
